name: The Tree Up
description:
Make the trees grow !!!

Music : Click Here !

How To Play :

Click on the poop to collect it!

Make some fertilizer and place it on the tree to make it grow!

The birds are coming to peck your tree to make it shrink! Click on the birds to make them disappear!

Make guards to protect yourself from bird attacks! The guards can also collect the poop for you!

Pause the game so you can move the guards without being disturbed by the birds!

Thank you to playing !
